EmailTemplate.description: Confirmation email for registrants - Debbie's Lunch & Learn Wall Builder event in Kansas City
EmailTemplate.name: Response - WB Lunch & learn - Kansas City
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Wall Builder Lunch & Learn
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for registering for theLunch & Learn on October 28. The event will begin at Husch Blackwell Sanders at 11:30am.
Regards,
-Debbie Hineman
IntApp Lunch-and-Learn – Wall Builder
Date: Tuesday, October 28
Time: 11:30am – 1:00pm with lunch included
Location: Husch Blackwell Sanders 4801 Main Street 10th Floor/Sanders (VC 24-80) Kansas City, MO 33607
